heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_tinker
heroes.bio_loc: Boush the Tinker's diminutive race is known for its intelligence, its cunning, and its prickly relationship with magic. As a matter of pride, they survive by their wits, and use only those powers of nature that may be unlocked through rational methodologies. Even this forbearance has led to a great deal of trouble, as Boush can attest. Once a key investigator of natural law, Boush the Tinker led a vast intellectual investigation into the workings of nature, founding a subterranean laboratory in the rumored, mist-wreathed wastes of the Violet Plateau. While scorning mages for the dangers they visit upon the world, Boush and his Tinker associates haughtily wrenched open a portal to some realm beyond comprehension and ushered in some nightmares of their own. A black mist rose from the cavernous interior of the Violet Plateau, shrouding it in permanent darkness from which sounds of horror perpetually emanate. Boush escaped with only his wits and the contraptions he carried, the sole Tinker to survive the Violet Plateau Incident.
heroes.hype_loc: Tinker demolishes foes with swarms of machines and a host of deadly gadgets. If he can gather the resources he needs, the power that instantly refreshes his abilities enables him to lead his team from every front.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Demolishes his enemies with swarms of machines

abilities.name: tinker_laser
abilities.desc_loc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
abilities.lore_loc: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
abilities.scepter_loc: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +%scepter_bonus_cast_range% cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by %scepter_reduction_pct%%% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to %scepter_bounce_radius% range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

abilities.name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile
abilities.desc_loc: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within %radius% range.
abilities.lore_loc: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.

abilities.name: tinker_defense_matrix
abilities.desc_loc: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.

abilities.name: tinker_warp_grenade
abilities.desc_loc: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for %debuff_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: tinker_keen_teleport
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.
abilities.lore_loc: As Boush likes to say, 'There is nothing the arcane can accomplish that the curious mind cannot reproduce given time. And proper funding, of course.'

abilities.name: tinker_rearm
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities and grants bonus magic resistance for %armor_duration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
notes_loc: Rearm works on all items except Aeon Disk, Arcane Boots, Black King Bar, Hand of Midas, Helm of the Dominator, Helm of the Overlord, Linken's Sphere, Meteor Hammer, Pipe of Insight, Refresher Orb, Revenant's Brooch (passive ability), and all neutral items.
